abstract: A time value that indicates the asset’s duration.
overview:
## Discussion

If you initialized the asset by passing the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAssetPreferPreciseDurationAndTimingKey] initialization option, this property value provides the asset’s precise duration; otherwise, it provides a best-available estimate. You can determine the value’s accuracy by querying the asset’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/providesPreciseDurationAndTiming] property.

# duration

**Instance Property**

A time value that indicates the asset’s duration.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

If you initialized the asset by passing the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAssetPreferPreciseDurationAndTimingKey] initialization option, this property value provides the asset’s precise duration; otherwise, it provides a best-available estimate. You can determine the value’s accuracy by querying the asset’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/providesPreciseDurationAndTiming] property.
title: duration
